alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Dixie County through 530 PM EDT... At 458 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Steinhatchee. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Minor Flooding due to heavy rain and Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flood impacts including roadway ponding are expected. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cross City, Shamrock, Hines, Jonesboro and Jena. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie
